block.p: Mary Wilson Lambert, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Paul C. Lambert of New York, was married yesterday to Nils Bolset, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Ivar Bolset of Tingvoll, Norway. The Rev. Herbert G. Draesel Jr. performed the ceremony at the Episcopal Church of the Holy Trinity in New York.

Ms. Lambert, 31, is keeping her name. She is a senior consultant in New York for Fort Point Partners, an e-commerce strategies and systems business. She graduated from Yale University and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. Her father, who was the ambassador to Ecuador from 1990 to 1992, is a senior counsel at Whitman Breed Abbott & Morgan, a New York law firm. He is also a director of the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center. Her mother, Mary Lee Lambert, is a director of the Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies.

Mary Wilson Lambert, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Paul C. Lambert of New York, was married yesterday to Nils Bolset, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Ivar Bolset of Tingvoll, Norway. The Rev. Herbert G. Draesel Jr. performed the ceremony at the Episcopal Church of the Holy Trinity in New York.

Ms. Lambert, 31, is keeping her name. She is a senior consultant in New York for Fort Point Partners, an e-commerce strategies and systems business. She graduated from Yale University and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. Her father, who was the ambassador to Ecuador from 1990 to 1992, is a senior counsel at Whitman Breed Abbott & Morgan, a New York law firm. He is also a director of the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center. Her mother, Mary Lee Lambert, is a director of the Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies.

Mr. Bolset, 33, is a senior management consultant on mergers and acquisitions at Deloitte Consulting in New York. He graduated from the Oslo College of Economics. He received an M.B.A. from the University of Navarre in Spain, where he met the bride, who was also studying there. His mother, Malfrid Bolset, owns and manages Kirkebekledning, a company that produces handmade textiles in Tingvoll. His father retired as the headmaster of Meisingset, a public elementary school in Tingvoll.
